en_text: For 1 turn, increase ATK by 70% for each [Resistance-Blind] awakening skill on the team

jp_skill.name: ダークネスアイズ
jp_skill.raw_description: 1ターンの間、チーム内の暗闇耐性の 覚醒数に応じて攻撃力が上昇。（暗闇耐性＋は5個分で加算）

kr_skill.name: 다크니스 아이즈
kr_skill.raw_description: 1턴 동안 팀 내의 암흑 내성의 각성수에 따라 공격력이 상승 (암흑내성+는 5개로 계산)

na_skill.name: Eyes of Darkness
na_skill.raw_description: ATK increases by the number of [Resistance-Blind] Awoken Skills in team for 1 turn (Resistance-Blind+ counts as 5)
